data.comment: The match has started at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In Crotone Crotone attack through Junior Messias. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 1, Milan have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Denis Dragus of Crotone is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 8, Hakan Calhanoglu gets his shot on target but fails to score for Milan.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
Milan are coming forward and Brahim Diaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a Crotone throw-in in Milan's half.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Milan.
In the minute 14, Milan's Brahim Diaz is on target but unsuccessful.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 16, Hakan Calhanoglu for Milan drives towards goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Milan to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan apply pressure at Stadio Ezio Scida and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Simon Kjaer but the strike hits the bar!
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 21, Crotone's Junior Messias misses with an attempt on goal.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Milan a goal kick.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 25, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Free kick for Milan in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 26, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Crotone will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Milan.
In the minute 32, Hakan Calhanoglu (Milan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hakan Calhanoglu of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Crotone.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Milan's area.
Goal kick for Milan at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Crotone.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Milan to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Free kick Milan.
In the minute 42, In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Matteo Gabbia (Milan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Crotone a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
In the minute 45, Milan have been given a penalty...
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Crotone.
Goal! Franck Kessie gives Milan the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Luca Marrone for Crotone has been booked by Luca J. Pairetto and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Crotone.
The home team have replaced Niccolo Zanellato with Eduardo Henrique. This is the first substitution made today by Giovanni Stroppa.
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 47, Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo is whistled for offside at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a Milan throw-in in Crotone's half.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Milan take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Brahim Diaz.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Milan.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 52, Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Denis Dragus for the home team is judged to be offside.
Milan have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Luca J. Pairetto awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Stefano Pioli is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Ezio Scida with Lorenzo Colombo replacing Ante Rebic.
In the minute 59, Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Crotone.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
Free kick Crotone.
In the minute 62, Matteo Gabbia (Milan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 63, Ismael Bennacer is replacing Sandro Tonali for the away team.
Milan make their third substitution with Samu Castillejo replacing Alexis Saelemaekers.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 66, In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Crotone a goal kick.
Milan needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Milan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 71, Luca J. Pairetto signals a Milan throw-in in Crotone's half.
In Crotone, Milan push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The home team replace Pedro Pereira with Arkadiusz Reca.
In the minute 78, At Stadio Ezio Scida, Theo Hernandez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Milan.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Milan at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Milan's Brahim Diaz gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
In the minute 83, Andrea Rispoli is on a sub for Salvatore Molina for Crotone.
Rade Krunic is replacing Hakan Calhanoglu for Milan at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a fifth substitution, with Rafael Leao replacing Brahim Diaz.
In the minute 84, Milan advance rapidly upfield but Luca J. Pairetto blows for offside.
Luca J. Pairetto awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Crotone in the half of Milan.
Milan drive upfield and Rafael Leao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Milan drives forward and Ismael Bennacer gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Milan.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Milan.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Crotone.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Lorenzo Colombo for Milan is whistled offside.
Free kick Crotone.
Vladimir Golemic (Crotone) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
Milan's Rafael Leao has been booked in Crotone.
